room_title: Escape room "The Recruits" by Bangor Escape Rooms in Bangor
review: We did the Recruits room and had a blast! A very well put together operation, highly recommend, go in with an open mind!

room_title: Escape room "The Recruits" by Bangor Escape Rooms in Bangor
review: The Recruits was tough, but so fun! A real challenge and a super cool room that made us feel like CIA! We will be back for sure!

room_title: Escape room "The Recruits" by Bangor Escape Rooms in Bangor
review: We had 9 in our group and had an amazing time! We did the control room and even though we didn't escape in time, we all had a great time. Would definitely recommend to groups of friends or team building activities.
